About the Sports Club# Welcome to Athletic Community Club

Founded in 2020, we are located in Cologne, Germany and dedicated to our mission: To provide a supportive and competitive environment where athletes of all levels can develop their skills, build lasting friendships, and achieve their personal best.

Our Teams

We currently have 3 active teams across different sports and divisions:

Cologne Kickers

Sport: Football | Division: Senior | Founded: 2020

Our flagship senior soccer team competing in the regional league.

Coach: Angelina Martinez

Members: 4 active players

Cologne Strikers

Sport: Soccer | Division: Youth | Founded: 2021

Developing young talent in a supportive environment.

Coach: Aylin Çelik

Members: 3 active players

Cologne Runners

Sport: Track & Field | Division: Mixed | Founded: 2022

Multi-event track and field team for all ages.

Coach: Maximilian Schuster

Members: 2 active players

Training Schedule

We offer 4 regular training sessions throughout the week:

  • Tuesday Training - Tuesday at 19:00 (90 min)

    • Team: Cologne Kickers
    • Location: Main Field

  • Thursday Training - Thursday at 19:00 (90 min)

    • Team: Cologne Kickers
    • Location: Main Field

  • Saturday Training - Saturday at 10:00 (60 min)

    • Team: Cologne Strikers
    • Location: Youth Field

  • Track Training - Wednesday at 18:00 (75 min)

    • Team: Cologne Runners
    • Location: Athletics Track

View Full Training Schedule →
